subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Only illness, accident or profound bad luck are likely to prevent Vincenzo Nibali from winning the Tour de France on Sunday after his stage victory on Thursday in the mountains.
snippet: Only illness, accident or profound bad luck are likely to prevent Vincenzo Nibali from winning the Tour de France on Sunday after his stage victory on Thursday in the mountains.
